resources.string: We can\'t find any existing account with this phone number.
An error ocurred while signin-in. Please retry.
This cellphone number is already used by another user.
An error occured while creating your account. Please try again.
n error occured while creating your account. It seems that the cellphone number you provided is incorrect.
An error ocurred while signin-in. Please check your network connection and retry.
You will receive a text message very soon. This message contains a verification code. Please enter the code below.

In order to exchange profiles with someone, press the green Share button on both devices. Then, stick the devices back-to-back until the Android Beam window appears on both screens. Finally, press simultaneously on both screens.
This device does not support NFC technology. Unfortunately, you won\'t be able to exchange your profile with someone else.
In order to exchange profiles using NFC, please activate this functionnality in the device\'s preferences.
In order to exchange profiles with another device, Yoki requires that you activate Android Beam in the device\'s preferences.
An error occured while sending the verification code.
An error occured while trying to verify your account.
It seems that the code you provided is invalid.
It seems to be a connection problem. Please try again later.
This e-mail address is invalid. Please verify that its format is conform to the following example : abc@def.xx .
This name is invalid. It may contain illegal or special characters, or its size is innapropriate.
The telephone number format is invalid. A phone number should only contain decimal numbers, and its size must be between 9 and 15 characters long.
The text that you have entered contains special illegal characters, or its size is innapropriate.
The data that has been received is corrupted or does not allow to fetch data from a Yoki account. Please try again.
An error occured while synchronizing your LinkedIn Account. Please try again later.
An error occured while synchronizing your Facebook Account. Please try again later.
An error occured while synchronizing your Twitter Account. Please try again later.
In order to attach your Twitter profile to Yoki, please install the Twitter App on your device.
An error occured when authentifying to the LinkedIn platform.
